name: Turtle Blaster
description:
My first game using the LÖVE game framework(Also known as love2d) !! :D

This game was made for the Tortle Jam

>Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to shoot
>Credits

Libraries used are Classic and Shack
Enemy explosion sound can be found here
Background music can be found here (Arpent by Kevin MacLeod)
